divs: Sighting Detailsi was with my mother at a red light by bi-lo and i thought i saw what appeared to be a helicopter but it was moving in a weird way like ive never seen befor and it kept getting lower and lower till it was right over the street light in the bi-lo parking lot it was a circle with lights on the side just like alot of people describe ufos but it was the size of a hummer and everyone at the red light had to see it i was flipping out yelling at my mom to turn the car around so we could follow it but by the time we turned around it was gone
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in greenwood
There were no other sightings in greenwood on or around September 15th 2009
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
